content.raw:
I found that jiggling Val with the Gazebo location or orientation controls sometimes will break loose a stuck re-harness. Just little jiggle or Val goes ballistic. 

Another datum is that with the pose screwed up Val doesn't respond to the pelvis height topic at times if she's squatting. The controller won't initiate the movement is my guess because it is seeing a pelvis height that is close to the accepted request. But Val is actually lower than the normal startup pose. I jiggled that situation into working but Val never stood up entirely but did duck walked to the finish box before collapsing by stepping off the end. The vision to pelvis transform was off so the calculated walking distance was more than existed.
content.html:
I found that jiggling Val with the Gazebo location or orientation controls sometimes will break loose a stuck re-harness. Just little jiggle or Val goes ballistic.

Another datum is that with the pose screwed up Val doesn't respond to the pelvis height topic at times if she's squatting. The controller won't initiate the movement is my guess because it is seeing a pelvis height that is close to the accepted request. But Val is actually lower than the normal startup pose. I jiggled that situation into working but Val never stood up entirely but did duck walked to the finish box before collapsing by stepping off the end. The vision to pelvis transform was off so the calculated walking distance was more than existed.
